title: Military NA transfer To Japan Region
body: I change my Client to Japan Server but when i try to log in it wont allow me anyway to fix this issue?

replies.body: You can't change the region on the client to get your entire account transferred. To play on JP, you'll need to either transfer your account (currently account transfers are closed until about Nov 20 due to end of season) or create a new account on the JP server.
